code: @Override protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     DdbStreamConfiguration configuration = this.configuration.copy().     configuration.setTableName(remaining).     setProperties(configuration, parameters).     if (remaining == null || remaining.trim().length() == 0) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Table name must be specified.").     }     configuration.setTableName(remaining).     if (ObjectHelper.isEmpty(configuration.getAccessKey())) {         setAccessKey(accessKey).     }     if (ObjectHelper.isEmpty(configuration.getSecretKey())) {         setSecretKey(secretKey).     }     if (ObjectHelper.isEmpty(configuration.getRegion())) {         setRegion(region).     }     if (configuration.getAmazonDynamoDbStreamsClient() == null && (configuration.getAccessKey() == null || configuration.getSecretKey() == null)) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("amazonDDBStreamsClient or accessKey and secretKey must be specified").     }     DdbStreamEndpoint endpoint = new DdbStreamEndpoint(uri, configuration, this).     setProperties(endpoint, parameters).     return endpoint. }

comment: /**  * The AWS DDB stream default configuration  */
code: /**  * The AWS DDB stream default configuration  */ public void setConfiguration(DdbStreamConfiguration configuration) {     this.configuration = configuration. }
/**  * Amazon AWS Access Key  */ public void setAccessKey(String accessKey) {     configuration.setAccessKey(accessKey). }
/**  * Amazon AWS Secret Key  */ public void setSecretKey(String secretKey) {     configuration.setSecretKey(secretKey). }
/**  * Amazon AWS Region  */ public void setRegion(String region) {     configuration.setRegion(region). }
